title: Next: A Cam Thomas Story
description: Camryn Thomas and Michelle Hamilton have finally got their lives heading in the right direction.  Together.  But even when you're happy, life will throw up some curve balls.   How will they deal with the idea of Michelle coming out?  And what will happen when they discover not everybody is happy about their relationship?  Get ready to find out what happens 'Next!'  This is the follow up to Out: A Cam Thomas Story
author: Claire Highton-Stevenson
